Title: El aniversario del fallecimiento de la suegra de Enhart
Plot: A man (Enhart) is urged by his wife to visit the tomb of his mother-in-law in the anniversary of her death. After buying some flowers, Enhart goes to the cemetery, gets drunk and falls asleep. Policemen come and take him to the jail. After that, he's rescued by his partner, Alegria, and goes to the theatre where he acts a comical show.
